democracy.name: The Republic of Solara
democracy.description: A faction that upholds individual rights, innovation, and technological growth through a system where citizens elect representatives.

democracy.name: The Free Systems Confederation
democracy.description: Known for its direct democracy and decentralized governance, this faction emphasizes citizen participation in decision-making.

democracy.name: The Alliance of Horizons
democracy.description: A faction with a federal structure balancing power between national and regional states, fostering unity and diversity.

monarchy.name: The Imperial Dynasty of Erythia
monarchy.description: A faction ruled by a sovereign with supreme authority, reflecting the grandeur of France's monarchy under Louis XIV.

monarchy.name: The Sovereign Star Kingdom
monarchy.description: A monarchy where the royal family holds symbolic power while a parliamentary system governs the nation.

monarchy.name: The Solar Dominion
monarchy.description: A hierarchical society where the emperor holds symbolic power while regional lords govern independently.

communist.name: The Red Star Collective
communist.description: A faction controlled by a central Communist Party aiming to suppress class divisions and centralize governance.

communist.name: The Proletariat Union
communist.description: Inspired by China's one-party state, focusing on collective and industrial efforts under strict state control.

authoritarian.name: The Dominion of Vahra
authoritarian.description: A totalitarian regime controlled through military power, surveillance, and absolute authority.

authoritarian.name: The New Order of Vel'ka
authoritarian.description: A ruthless one-party state with total control over public and political life.

authoritarian.name: The Supreme Dominion of Tyrath
authoritarian.description: A faction ruled by a singular authority with a focus on centralized control and minimal political freedoms.

oligarchy.name: The Merchant Guild of Xeros
oligarchy.description: Controlled by wealthy merchant families who dominate trade and wield economic power.

oligarchy.name: The Councils of Aether
oligarchy.description: A small elite group governs this faction, emphasizing military and social control.

theocracy.name: The Celestial Synod of Arcanis
theocracy.description: Combines political and divine authority, where rulers are seen as gods.

theocracy.name: The Holy Empire of Solaris
theocracy.description: A faction where religious leaders hold both spiritual and political power over vast territories.

theocracy.name: The Order of the Eternal Flame
theocracy.description: Governed by a council of clergy, decisions are guided by divine will and religious doctrines.

federalism.name: The Federation of Solaris
federalism.description: A federation uniting diverse states with significant autonomy under a central government.

federalism.name: The Stellar Confederation
federalism.description: A loose union of semi-autonomous regions that collaborate on shared issues.

federalism.name: The United Systems of Althera
federalism.description: A federation of states united under a single constitution while retaining significant independence.
